subject: Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Testosterone
Tests (Drug Use)
lead_paragraph: Despite successfully appealing his positive drug test on grounds that his sample was mishandled, questions still surround Ryan Braun concerning what type of banned substance caused him to fail the test.
snippet: Despite successfully appealing his positive drug test on grounds that his sample was mishandled, questions still surround Ryan Braun concerning what type of banned substance caused him to fail the test.
